entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Brockville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:53 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brockville 1:00 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -4.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -6.9°C
Wind: ENE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 3.
